data.title: NOVAr Railway Outdoor Circuit Breaker
data.meta_description: NOVAr series vacuum circuit breaker is an outdoor power distribution switchgear dedicated designed for railway system by Eaton. It can be used in 27.5kV and 2x27.5kV, 50Hz railway power systems. By utilizing Eaton's most advanced, high-performance vacuum interrupter, and equipped with Eaton's new generation spring mechanism, this switchgear can provide high reliability and excellent breaking performance for customers.
